recode:Vengeful_Strike.NAME: Vengeful Strike
recode:Vengeful_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !M! damage again.

recode:Code_Shatter.NAME: Code Shatter
recode:Code_Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies and yourself.

recode:Rage_Reboot.NAME: Rage Reboot
recode:Rage_Reboot.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Draw 1 Card

recode:Backlash_Protocol.NAME: Backlash Protocol
recode:Backlash_Protocol.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Weak, deal an additional !M! damage.

recode:Firewall_Fissure.NAME: Firewall Fissure
recode:Firewall_Fissure.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Block, deal an additional !M! damage.

recode:Binary_Bash.NAME: Binary Bash
recode:Binary_Bash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage of all Binary Bash cards by !M! for the rest of the combat.

recode:Binary_Exception.NAME: Binary Exception
recode:Binary_Exception.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Create !M! copies of Binary Bash and add them to the discard pile. Exhaust.

recode:Defragment_Destruction.NAME: Defragment Destruction
recode:Defragment_Destruction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Create !M! Fragments that shuffle into the deck.  Exhaust.
